name: Skyhigh Horror
description:
Hello! This game was made using construct 3. In this rhythm roguelite you run around bashing in zombies while 80s music plays which has your gun shooting to the beat. After fighting through 20 floors you beat the final boss and win!

Credits:

Will Tice/unTied games https://untiedgames.itch.io/
